info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 8:20AM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 9 inches possible. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Watch, from late tonight through Friday afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
